name: Sonic 560
description:
My second entry for TweetTweet Jam 2.

Collect rings and avoid missiles while perpetually chasing Dr. Eggman in this fast-paced endless runner.

Controls

  • [🅾️❎(ZX)] Jump (edge triggered)
  • [⬆️⬇️⬅️➡️] Roll

The uppermost number is the amount of rings that Sonic has collected, while the lower shows our high score for the current session.

The PICO8 cart is also available to download for console owners.

BONUS:

Yo, go check out this other cool-ass Sonic game by @powersaurus!

https://powersaurus.itch.io/sonictthehedgehogthemoviethegame
